metadata.name: Valley of Seeking
metadata.description: Haft7 is a collection of 7 unique artwork pieces developed by Lydia Pourmand and Elevate's NFT Residency Program Cohort 1. Seekers journey through the “Seven Valleys” of the “Conference of Birds”- a mystical Sufi allegory towards self-cognition. This 12th-century Persian epic is a vehicle to create a space within the metaverse to guide it’s visitors towards finding their Truth, and the among trans and queers towards self-fulfilment.
